extendedInfo.description: Akinator can read your mind and tell you what character you are thinking about, just by asking a few questions. Think of a real or fictional character and Akinator will try to guess who it is. Will you dare challenge the Genie?NEW: Available in Arabic (only from Android OS 4.0)Customize people you know (name and picture) to impress your friends, share your results on Facebook, discover the new Akinometer... and much more in the updates to come. Turn on the child filter to let your children play safely. Version also adapted for your tablet.Become Akinator's fan on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/AkinatorFollow Akinator on Twitter: http://twitter.com/akinator_teamPlease note:-Akinator requires an Internet connection to use his magic lamp. Turn on Wifi or be sure to have a data plan (3G).- Available in several languages (French, English, Spanish, Portuguese, German, Japanese, Arabic, Russian, Italian, Chinese, Turkish, Korean, Hebrew and Dutch).-To select your language, don't forget to scroll down the list to find it.

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: The app doesn\'t open. It freezes on the logo screen and after a few seconds it just turns off. Please fix this :(
reviews.author: Eve Ly

reviews.title: Works fine for me
reviews.comment: Works find for me I have no problems or anything!
reviews.author: Corey Bonds

reviews.title: Eh
reviews.comment: Even with the child filter,  it still asks inappropriate questions.
reviews.author: Edward Schnepf

reviews.title: Technical error
reviews.comment: To defeat the technical error, go into settings/Apps/Akinator and Clear Data and Force Stop. The app will reset and resume normal function.
reviews.author: Vince Ruscigno

reviews.title: Amazing!
reviews.comment: I did both Subject Delta and Booker DeWitt from the BioShock series, he guessed it right every time!
reviews.author: John Connor

reviews.title: Used to be good, but then...
reviews.comment: It got very VERY slow. So slow it displayed the message \"A technical problem has occurred,  please Try Again\" when I press a button in gameplay. It only displays that sometimes but most of the time its awfuly slow.
reviews.author: Matthew Owens

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I am a super lazy person who don\'t really rate or write reviews unless it\'s super good!
reviews.author: Mohd Naufal

reviews.title: It sorta works
reviews.comment: It works, but you need to know the character really well.
reviews.author: Brandon Landers

reviews.comment: This game freaks me out! It guesses right every single time! Who knows who suzie snowflake is? Wow! Love it!
reviews.author: Kimberly Knight

reviews.title: Great game to pass a few minutes
reviews.comment: Love this game. Hardest thing about it is trying too think of characters it hasn\'t heard of! Good fun! Pretty hard to beat!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Muito mal feito
reviews.comment: Loading popup is annoying, N\303\203O RECOMENDO!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Technical error.  Cant get refund
reviews.comment: Really slow, a technical error message keeps popping up
reviews.author: Trace Palmer

reviews.title: Good fun!
reviews.comment: It freezes way too often on my s4. If this is fixed then it would be 5 stars. I enjoy seeing how far I can push it
reviews.author: Chan Mors

reviews.title: Very smart
reviews.comment: Very clever, we\'re having a great time thinking of the most obscure and untried characters.
reviews.author: Steven Hattersley

reviews.title: fun
reviews.comment: i have it on my ipad and i got it here
reviews.author: Matthew Stephenson

reviews.title: Sometimes...
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t guess correctly 98% of the time after the update. Fix it please
reviews.author: Obito Uchiha

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Fun game
reviews.author: Dylan Knight

reviews.title: SUPER!
reviews.comment: Perfectly made!
reviews.author: Andrei Ionut Negulescu

reviews.title: Woa
reviews.comment: Even guesses the minor characters of Korean dramas..... O___o

reviews.title: Cant select language
reviews.comment: Scroll to select language. Scroll all directions.  Nothing.  Help me?
